trans-unit.source: Specifies a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref> as the parameter to be used for hit testing a visual tree.
trans-unit.target: Specifica un <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"> </xref> come parametro da utilizzare per l'hit test di un struttura ad albero visuale.

trans-unit.source: With the GeometryHitTestParameters class, you can use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry> value for hit testing, to determine whether any visual object intersects with the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry> value.
trans-unit.target: Con la classe GeometryHitTestParameters, è possibile utilizzare un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry>valore per l'hit test per determinare se qualsiasi oggetto visivo si interseca con il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry>valore.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry>

trans-unit.source: You can also hit test with a <xref:System.Windows.Point> value by creating a <xref:System.Windows.Media.PointHitTestParameters> object.
trans-unit.target: È inoltre possibile hit test con un <xref:System.Windows.Point>valore creando un <xref:System.Windows.Media.PointHitTestParameters>oggetto.</xref:System.Windows.Media.PointHitTestParameters> </xref:System.Windows.Point>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] hit testing only considers the filled area of a geometry during a hit test.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] di hit testing prende in considerazione esclusivamente l'area di riempimento di una geometria durante un hit test.

trans-unit.source: If you create a point <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry>, the hit test would not intersect anything because a point has no area.
trans-unit.target: Se si crea un punto <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry>, l'hit test sarebbe non determina alcuna intersezione perché un punto di non presenta un'area.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeometryHitTestParameters"></xref> class, using the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeometryHitTestParameters"> </xref> classe, utilizzando l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref> value to use for the hit test geometry.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"> </xref> valore da utilizzare per la geometria dell'hit test.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref> that defines the hit test geometry for this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeometryHitTestParameters"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"> </xref> che definisce la geometria dell'hit test per questo <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeometryHitTestParameters"> </xref> istanza.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref> that defines the hit test region.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"> </xref> che definisce l'area di hit test.
